data.title: Kathy Baker Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Kathy Baker on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Kathy Baker including 13 Going on 30, The Age of Adaline, and more.
data.text:
A Family Affair

The heat is on in Atlanta when the BAU investigates murders of women and realizes they are looking for more than one unsub.

Sin

A successful preacher (guest star Tim Daly) is the prime suspect in a murder case. - Benson (Mariska Hargitay) and Stabler (Chris Meloni) pay a visit to The New Souls Church, where Reverend Jeb Curtis, his wife Hannah (guest star Kathy Baker) and their remaining nine children are mourning the death of a military son in Afghanistan. They seem like a loving family from the outside, but things are not what they seem. Hannah provides the detectives with a taped conversation of the Reverend that leads the SVU to come after a different suspect.
